pinterest.enableHover.title: Enable hover
pinterest.enableHover.description: Check this box to enable the Pinterest Pin It to hover over the image.

pinterest.enableButton.title: Enable button
pinterest.enableButton.description: Check this box to enable the Pinterest PinIt button.

pinterest.imageSize.title: Image size
pinterest.imageSize.description: Enter the Pinterest image size ID to show on Pinterest.

pinterest.popupOptions.status.title: Pinterest popup status
pinterest.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.resizable.title: Pinterest popup resizable
pinterest.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the Pinterest popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

pinterest.popupOptions.scrollbars.title: Pinterest popup scrollbars
pinterest.popupOptions.scrollbars.description: Select yes to show scrollbars on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide them.

pinterest.popupOptions.personalbar.title: Pinterest popup personalbar
pinterest.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.directories.title: Pinterest popup directories
pinterest.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.location.title: Pinterest popup location
pinterest.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Pinterest popup toolbar
pinterest.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.menubar.title: Pinterest popup menubar
pinterest.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the Pinterest popup menu. Select no to hide it.

pinterest.popupOptions.width.title: Pinterest popup width
pinterest.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.height.title: Pinterest popup height
pinterest.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.left.title: Pinterest popup left
pinterest.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.

pinterest.popupOptions.top.title: Pinterest popup top
pinterest.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Pinterest popup.
